text: aur jitane darakht zameen mein hain sab ke sab qalam ban jaen aur samandar usakee siyaahee banen aur usake (khatm hone ke) baad aur saat samandar (siyaahee ho jaen aur khuda ka ilm aur usakee baaten likhee jaen) to bhee khuda kee baaten khatm na hogeen beshak khuda sab par gaalib (aur) daana (beena) hai
